entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as a symbol of evil and is associated with Voldemort. It is described as being made by an incantation ("I is not making the Dark Mark, sir!").

entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a Ministry wizard who is investigating the incident with Winky and the wand. He is described as having hardening eyes when looking at Winky.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is an elf who found the wand and was accused of making the Dark Mark. She has a squeaky little voice and is described as cowering in front of Mr. Diggory.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having missed the wand when they got into the wood. He is not directly involved in the incident with Winky and the Dark Mark.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione speaks up to defend Winky, stating that she did not make the incantation for the Dark Mark. She is described as looking nervous but determined.

relationships.description: Winky was accused of making the Dark Mark, but she claims she did not know how to do it.
Hermione defended Winky by stating that she did not make the incantation for the Dark Mark.
